item.title: How to get to Havana from the Airport?
item.author: boaz@boazsobrado.com (Boaz Sobrado)
item.description: One of the first difficulties visitors to Cuba face (at least those who aren’t participating in a package holiday or haven’t rented a car) is how to get from the airport to their hotel or B&B. We hope to offer some information in how you can do this. PRIVATE TRANSFERS FROM HAVANA AIRPORT TO THE CITY You can book a private transfer at sites like Havana Airport Transfers. The price is usually around 30 CUC (up to 4 people) or 50 CUC (5 people or more).
